StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateCandidateASVAB]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@MarineCandidateID int, @Version varchar(3), @PreviousVersion varchar(3) = @Version, @ASVABDate date.me, @PreviousASVABDate date.me = @ASVABDate, @GS varchar(2), @AR varchar(2), @WK varchar(2), @PC varchar(2), @NO varchar(2), @CS varchar(2), @AS varchar(2), @MK varchar(2), @MC varchar(2), @EI varchar(2), @VE varchar(2), @AFQT int, @GT int, @EL int, @CL int, @MM int, @MEPS int, @UserLogin varchar(15) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @TranType varchar(8) DECLARE @ErrMsg varchar(100) DECLARE @SSN char(9) DECLARE @DBID int DECLARE @DBNAME sysname
SELECT @DBID = DB_ID(), @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_ASVAB CA WHERE CA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateId AND VERSION = @PreviousVersion AND ASVAB_DATE = @PreviousASVABDate) BEGIN SET @TranType = 'upda.ng'
UPDATE CANDIDATE_ASVAB SET VERSION = @Version, ASVAB_DATE = @ASVABDate, GS_SUBTEST = @GS, AR_SUBTEST = @AR, WK_SUBTEST = @WK, PC_SUBTEST = @PC, NO_SUBTEST = @NO, CS_SUBTEST = @CS, AS_SUBTEST = @AS, MK_SUBTEST = @MK, MC_SUBTEST = @MC, EI_SUBTEST = @EI, VE_SUBTEST = @VE, AFQT_SCORE = @AFQT, GT_SCORE = @GT, EL_SCORE = @EL, CL_SCORE = @CL, MM_SCORE = @MM, MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID = @MEPS, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateId AND VERSION = @PreviousVersion AND ASVAB_DATE = @PreviousASVABDate
IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN SELECT @SSN = SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER FROM PERSON WHERE PERSON_ID = @MarineCandidateID
SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred ' + @TranType + ' the ASVAB record for SSN ' + @SSN + '.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END END ELSE BEGIN IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_ASVAB CA WHERE CA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateId AND VERSION = @Version AND ASVAB_DATE = @ASVABDate) BEGIN
SET @TranType = 'inser.ng'
INSERT INTO CANDIDATE_ASVAB (MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, VERSION, ASVAB_DATE, GS_SUBTEST, AR_SUBTEST, WK_SUBTEST, PC_SUBTEST, NO_SUBTEST, CS_SUBTEST, AS_SUBTEST, MK_SUBTEST, MC_SUBTEST, EI_SUBTEST, VE_SUBTEST, AFQT_SCORE, GT_SCORE, EL_SCORE, CL_SCORE, MM_SCORE, MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@MarineCandidateId, @Version, @ASVABDate, @GS, @AR, @WK, @PC, @NO, @CS, @AS, @MK, @MC, @EI, @VE, @AFQT, @GT, @EL, @CL, @MM, @MEPS, @UserLogin, GETDATE())
IF @@ERROR != 0 OR @@ROWCOUNT = 0 BEGIN SELECT @SSN = SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER FROM PERSON WHERE PERSON_ID = @MarineCandidateID
SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred ' + @TranType + ' the ASVAB record for SSN ' + @SSN + '.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 2, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END END ELSE BEGIN SELECT @SSN = SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER FROM PERSON WHERE PERSON_ID = @MarineCandidateID
SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred ' + @TranType + ' the ASVAB record for SSN ' + @SSN + '. This applicant already has an ASVAB with this date and version.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 3, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
